description: Describes the findings that are specified by the ARNs of the findings.

parameters.name: findingArns
parameters.description: The ARN that specifies the finding that you want to describe. (string) ---

nested_items.name: findings
nested_items.description: Information about the finding.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The ARN that specifies the finding.

nested_items.name: schemaVersion
nested_items.description: The schema version of this data type.

nested_items.name: service
nested_items.description: The data element is set to 'Inspector'.

nested_items.name: serviceAttributes
nested_items.description: This data type is used in the  Finding data type.

nested_items.name: schemaVersion
nested_items.description: The schema version of this data type.

nested_items.name: assessmentRunArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the assessment run during which the finding is generated.

nested_items.name: rulesPackageArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the rules package that is used to generate the finding.

nested_items.name: assetType
nested_items.description: The type of the host from which the finding is generated.

nested_items.name: assetAttributes
nested_items.description: A collection of attributes of the host from which the finding is generated.

nested_items.name: schemaVersion
nested_items.description: The schema version of this data type.

nested_items.name: agentId
nested_items.description: The ID of the agent that is installed on the EC2 instance where the finding is generated.

nested_items.name: autoScalingGroup
nested_items.description: The Auto Scaling group of the EC2 instance where the finding is generated.

nested_items.name: amiId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Amazon Machine Image (AMI) that is installed on the EC2 instance where the finding is generated.

nested_items.name: hostname
nested_items.description: The hostname of the EC2 instance where the finding is generated.

nested_items.name: ipv4Addresses
nested_items.description: The list of IP v4 addresses of the EC2 instance where the finding is generated.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: tags
nested_items.description: The tags related to the EC2 instance where the finding is generated.

nested_items.name: key
nested_items.description: A tag key.

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: A value assigned to a tag key.

nested_items.name: networkInterfaces
nested_items.description: An array of the network interfaces interacting with the EC2 instance where the finding is generated.

nested_items.name: networkInterfaceId
nested_items.description: The ID of the network interface.

nested_items.name: subnetId
nested_items.description: The ID of a subnet associated with the network interface.

nested_items.name: vpcId
nested_items.description: The ID of a VPC associated with the network interface.

nested_items.name: privateDnsName
nested_items.description: The name of a private DNS associated with the network interface.

nested_items.name: privateIpAddress
nested_items.description: The private IP address associated with the network interface.

nested_items.name: privateIpAddresses
nested_items.description: A list of the private IP addresses associated with the network interface. Includes the privateDnsName and privateIpAddress.

nested_items.name: privateDnsName
nested_items.description: The DNS name of the private IP address.

nested_items.name: privateIpAddress
nested_items.description: The full IP address of the network inteface.

nested_items.name: publicDnsName
nested_items.description: The name of a public DNS associated with the network interface.

nested_items.name: publicIp
nested_items.description: The public IP address from which the network interface is reachable.

nested_items.name: ipv6Addresses
nested_items.description: The IP addresses associated with the network interface.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: securityGroups
nested_items.description: A list of the security groups associated with the network interface. Includes the groupId and groupName.

nested_items.name: groupName
nested_items.description: The name of the security group.

nested_items.name: groupId
nested_items.description: The ID of the security group.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The ID of the finding.

nested_items.name: title
nested_items.description: The name of the finding.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the finding.

nested_items.name: recommendation
nested_items.description: The recommendation for the finding.

nested_items.name: severity
nested_items.description: The finding severity. Values can be set to High, Medium, Low, and Informational.

nested_items.name: numericSeverity
nested_items.description: The numeric value of the finding severity.

nested_items.name: confidence
nested_items.description: This data element is currently not used.

nested_items.name: indicatorOfCompromise
nested_items.description: This data element is currently not used.

nested_items.name: attributes
nested_items.description: The system-defined attributes for the finding.

nested_items.name: key
nested_items.description: The attribute key.

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: The value assigned to the attribute key.

nested_items.name: userAttributes
nested_items.description: The user-defined attributes that are assigned to the finding.

nested_items.name: key
nested_items.description: The attribute key.

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: The value assigned to the attribute key.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The time when the finding was generated.

nested_items.name: updatedAt
nested_items.description: The time when  AddAttributesToFindings is called.

nested_items.name: failedItems
nested_items.description: Finding details that cannot be described. An error code is provided for each failed item.

nested_items.name: failureCode
nested_items.description: (string) ---

nested_items.name: failureCode
nested_items.description: The status code of a failed item.

nested_items.name: retryable
nested_items.description: Indicates whether you can immediately retry a request for this item for a specified resource.
